subject: Running test methods in a test case in seperate VM's and in order
msgSnippet: Is this possible ? My problem is that I have a Unit test that does performance benchmarking of a product. Each test method tests one aspect of the product.
messageBody:
Is this possible ?

My problem is that I have a Unit test that does performance
benchmarking of a product.

Each test method tests one aspect of the product. The problem is the
VM performs full GC collection due to the memory being chewed up in a
single VM invocation that runs all testMethods.


This subsequently results in erronous perfromance times and stats.

so I'd like to run each testMethod in its own VM, and to avoid
multiple parallel test methods running and chewing up the memory, I
think I need to run the methods in order.

any ideas ?

thanks much in advance for info.
